name: Adventure in a Mysterious Island
description:
~Demo Version~

Adventure in a Mysterious Island is a Game-Boy inspired game that faithfully follows the charm of a old-school platform genre in the game.

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Movement

Z - Jump Button

X - Action Button

Backspace - "Select"

Enter - "Start"

This is a "Demo Version" and changes will occur in the final version.

There are still few major bugs I'm working on to fix. But I hope this is more than enough, considering the project still in development!  :D
